item.title: Go 1.16 Deprecating ioutil
item.description: A note about the recent Go 1.16 update: The familiar ioutil library is being marked as deprecated. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: Regular Expression for URL-Friendly Titles
item.description: This is a Go code snippet that will convert a string from regular grammatical syntax to a length-limited-url-form.

item.title: String Compression in Go
item.description: This is a Go code snippet that will compress and decompress a string.

item.title: Go Regular Expression for Emails
item.description: Contains Go code to help you validate an email address string with a regular expression.

item.title: go mod init Not Working
item.description: Sometimes, the `go mod init` doesn't work. This article might help.
